page.title: 13Jayne Allens Weekend (cont).
page.content: After dinner,the afternoon seemed to go quite quickly.Dad replaced a punctured wheel on his car and Mum did some washing and baking.We sat down to tea at about 5.30pm and ate chips,meat and cabbage,there was cake for seconds After washing-up we settled down to watch television.But the dreaded 9.15pm came and I was sent to bed. Sunday started in very much the same way as Saturday.After breakfast I decided to watch the T.V.,I taped the programme because my sister was revising (as usual).I then went to help Mum make lunch,I had sandwiches and a yoghurt.The time seemed to fly by,I did some housework then read for a while.Later I tidied my bedroom properly,which took quite a time because it was a mess. Then I forced myself to learn my Spellings until tea We watched TV until bedtime came again
